title: Butter Paddles Wooden 7.7" Butter Making Paddles Set of 2
features: Efficient Butter Crafting: Our butter paddle set is designed for effortless butter shaping and crafting, providing a smooth and even texture to your homemade butter.

Premium Set Details: This package includes 2 wooden butter paddles, each measuring 7.7 inches x 2.6 inches (19.5cm x 6.5cm) with a thickness of 0.6 inches (1.5cm). These paddles are perfect for butter making, shaping, and forming, adding a professional touch to your homemade creations.

Durable Wooden Construction: Made from high-quality wood, our butter making tool is built to last and withstand the rigors of daily use. The wooden material also adds a rustic charm to your kitchen, making it a perfect addition to your butter-making arsenal.

Versatile Butter Working Tool: These butter paddles are great for shaping and forming butter, making it a versatile and essential kitchen utensil. Experience the convenience of having multiple functions in one tool.

Perfect Gift for Home Cooks: This set of 2 wooden butter paddles makes an excellent gift for friends and family who love to cook and create homemade butter. Help them elevate their culinary skills with this practical and stylish butter crafting paddle set.
